alert.note: Alert for Salt Basin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 7:30AM CST until November 30 at 9:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, the Otero Mesa. In Texas, portions of Hudspeth county. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be damaged and blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing dust will be possible which could result in poor visibility and difficult driving conditions.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that winds of 35 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
